text: The owner of Na Soi Chicken Noodle Shop
Today, I will take you with me to see what we serve
This is the shop's components, customers can choose by themselves
We have 6 kinds on noodles, customers can choose any kind they want
First we cook the noodles for the customers and we put it in to the bawl
After that we give the bawl to the customers and they can add any component they like
You can choose anything you want
